content: Pekka Orponen Aalto.fi sci.aalto.fi cs.aalto.fi Pekka Orponen Research Interests Research Group Projects Publications Teaching Pekka Orponen Professor Surface mail Aalto University School of Science Department of Computer Science P.O. Box 15400, FI-00076 Aalto, Finland Visiting address Konemiehentie 2, Espoo/Otaniemi, Room B331 Phone +358 500 819491 E-mail firstname.lastname@aalto.fi Office hours By appointment Curriculum Vitae Research Interests DNA and RNA nanotechnology Algorithmics of self-organisation Computational complexity Research Group Natural Computation Projects Algorithmic Designs for Biomolecular Nanostructures (Academy of Finland, 2017-2021) FiDiPro Erik Aurell - Statistical Physics, Distributed Systems, and Computational Biology (Academy of Finland, 2009-2013) Modern Algorithmics and Its Interdisciplinary Applications (Academy of Finland, 2011) OLP: Online Optimisation and Production Planning (Academy of Finland, 2009-2011) Algorithmics for Data Security: Anomaly Detection and Call Graph Analysis (Tekes - National Technology Agency of Finland, 2009-2011) Publications A somewhat pruned list of my publications can be found here.
